about_the_game:
Tanks Racing Sim flips the script on traditional racing games by bringing the raw power of military tanks to the high-speed world of Formula 1. Imagine roaring down the track, with a tank hot on your heels, its massive barrel locked onto your vehicle. The question isn't whether you'll win—it's whether you’ll survive!

In this explosive racing game, you’ll trade sleek sports cars for heavy artillery as you take control of armored vehicles in a high-octane race to the finish. With tanks chasing you down and obstacles around every corner, the stakes couldn’t be higher. Will you speed your way to victory, or will you fall behind and become a target?

With a mix of 3 game modes—Single Race, Championship, and Free Mode—you can choose your challenge and dominate the track. Race across these adrenaline-pumping levels and master the 2 types of tracks: the standard racing circuit and the advanced Pro Track. The competition is fierce, but only the brave will emerge victorious.

Game Features:

- 3 Game Modes: Test your skills in Single Race, Championship, or Free Mode
- Thrilling levels: Each with its own unique challenges and hazards
- 2 track types: Choose between the standard track or the more difficult Pro Track
- High-speed racing with an unexpected twist: tank warfare on the racecourse!

Are you ready to face down the barrel of a tank while racing to the finish line? Strap in, rev your engines, and race like your life depends on it in Tanks Racing Sim—because it just might!
